item.elementalamulets.guide_book.subtitl: Contains all knowledge about Elemental Amulets
item.elementalamulets.water_element.tool: Elegant, clear but can be chaotic too
item.elementalamulets.earth_element.tool: Strong, powerful and filled with life
jei.elementalamulets.amulets.description:
Amulets - are magical jewels(in our case necklaces) that grant you a variety of powers.
 More about them you can read in Elemental Guide
jei.elementalamulets.guide_book.descript: A book with all information about this mod, to access it you need Patchouli!
jei.elementalamulets.elemental_combinato:
Allows you to combine things and get unique and powerful items!
 More about it you can read in Elemental Guide
jei.elementalamulets.elements.descriptio: Elements are four main powers in Minecraft's world!
jei.elementalamulets.convertibles.descri: When 6 of these are combined with empty element(Elemental Shards) they produce %s
patchouli.elementalamulets.not_present: Patchouli is not detected! Please install patchouli in order to get access to this book
advancements.elementalamulets.desc: Things that you will achieve in your adventure
advancements.elementalamulets.combine.de: Use Elemental Combinator for the first time!
advancements.elementalamulets.amulet_max: Upgrade amulet to the highest tier
commands.elementalamulets.give.failure: Error! %s is not an elemental amulet!
